com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.camera

Class CameraPosition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.camera.CameraPosition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public final class CameraPosition
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    Resembles the position, angle, zoom and tilt of the user's viewpoint.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CameraPosition.Builder
      Builder for composing CameraPosition objects.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT

        public static final CameraPosition DEFAULT

      • CREATOR

        public static final android.os.Parcelable.Creator<CameraPosition> CREATOR

      • bearing

        public final double bearing
        Direction that the camera is pointing in, in degrees clockwise from north.

      • target

        public final LatLng target
        The location that the camera is pointing at.

      • tilt

        public final double tilt
        The angle, in degrees, of the camera angle from the nadir (directly facing the Earth). See CameraPosition.Builder.tilt(double) for details of restrictions on the range of values.

      • zoom

        public final double zoom
        Zoom level near the center of the screen. See CameraPosition.Builder.zoom(double) for the definition of the camera's zoom level.

      • padding

        public final double[] padding
        Padding in pixels. Specified in left, top, right, bottom order. See CameraPosition.Builder.padding(double[]) for the definition of the camera's padding.

        public int hashCode()

There's no guarantee that this hash value will be consistent between different Java implementations, or even between different execution runs of the same program.
